channel.title: Ios on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ios on Blog

item.title: Calling with WebRTC on iOS
item.description: Image source: Interactive Powers Make direct voice calls from Apple iOS devices thanks to VideoRTC.js and its native WebRTC based tecnology In previous posts, we have looked at some key considerations for building apps for video calling on web browsers and mobile devices, and some of the features you can include to make sure your users have a great experience. Now iOS 11 works with all compliant Apple iPhone and iPad devices which is an important component for creating frictionless, delightful apps, especially voice calling.
